GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.6
GSD.description:
arm64: uaccess: avoid blocking within critical sections

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.6 by commit ff1a30740f7aa78699cea964640df6ff4f034bb5, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit f253d827f33cb5a5990b5cfd271941d1a21ecd85. For more details please see the references link.
